name: After life defense
description:
In an apocalypse-inspired race against time, you, a soldier who just died protecting his country from a huge kaiju, must help your comrades in defeating the monster. Their bullets can't hurt the creature, so you must absorb them and attack it with a big fireball!

Instructions:
Hold the right mouse button to absorb the soldiers' projectiles and to protect them from the falling fireballs. When you collect enough bullets, the indicator on the right will turn red: this means that you can now attack with the left mouse button, no need to aim.  Kill the kaiju before the flag goes down, and don't forget to protect your soldiers!

Controls:
Move with the mouse
defend/absorb with the right button
attack with the left button

Song by https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
